instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
instructions.2: Unwind the roll dough, and separate into 4 rectangles. Pinch together perforations to seal. Place 2 rectangles on a 9x13 inch baking sheet. Moisten edges of rectangles with water. Place 2 slices mozzarella on each rectangle. Top each with 2 teaspoons tomato paste. Sprinkle each with 1/4 teaspoon oregano. Cover each with remaining dough. Press the edges firmly with a fork to seal.
instructions.3: Bake in the preheated oven 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown.
